case.title: Any young american or european girls for fit young guy? - 18 (london)
case.text: Hi are you a american, english or european girl with a nice slim body under 25. This is not a strict requirement so reply back if your interested. If yes then I am looking for a gf or fwb kind of relationship on a long term. You have to be single and no one offs. If you are moving to london then thats probably good as well. I am a young slim and smooth bodied student. We can maybe go out and have fun and also inside the bedroom. Let me know if your interested. Thanks.
